alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Southern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 3:50AM MST until January 12 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Occasional light snow and bitter wind chills. Additional snow accumulations of an inch or less. Wind chills 20 to 35 below zero. * WHERE...In Montana, Bighorn Canyon and Southern Big Horn. In Wyoming, Sheridan Foothills. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Expect slick roads and areas of poor visibility. Those outdoors will be at risk for frost bite and hypothermia. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Watch for possible ice jams on rivers and streams, which could lead to minor flooding this weekend. Bitter cold wind chills will continue through the weekend.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
